message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I know will be of significant value to your business.  While I can't reveal the specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,200,000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000, a price that gives you a substantial return on your investment. This is a limited-time offer, as I have another buyer waiting in the wings. Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
